title: Are unstoppable abilities unhealthy?
body:
They don't offer much counter play aside from {{item:3157}} {{item:3102}}, or if you are lucky if you have a champion who can deal with such spells like {{champion:15}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:56}} 

{{champion:120}} ult
{{champion:56}} ult
{{champion:254}} ult
{{champion:54}} ult
{{champion:111}} ult

The only one I think offers enough counterplay is {{champion:14}} ult.
